name: Google+ Wide
description: Google Plus wide fluid layout with less white-space, nothing removed.
additional_info:
Compatibility: Tested on Windows 7, Firefox 1/Chrome 19, Resolution 1920x1080 (1080p) (Minimum Width: 960px)

Known Bugs:
- Games Page doesn't expand; Google's styling is inconsistent.

To Do:
- Hangout, Pages; More testing.

Update 16/04/2012
- Fixed Profile card public post bug, thanks user 139355.

Update 12/04/2012:
- Initial Beta Release.
